name: mypeoplebiz
tag_list: recruitment, social-media, plateform, hr, candidate, referrer, sourcing
overview:
Mypeoplebiz is an online multichannel recruitment platform that brings employers, job seekers, social networkers, referrers and recruitment agents together in one place.

Mypeoplebiz.com works with: -

Employers to save money, improve their recruitment and pay a fixed/flat fee.

Job seekers looking for a new position and who can sometimes receive sign-on fees.

Referrers/social networks refer your friends for jobs and earn referral fees.

Recruitment agencies who want to introduce their candidates to a range of employers.

Mypeoplebiz.com makes recruitment more cost effective by encouraging direct applications, creating referral schemes and managing the cost of agency introductions and by communicating with all the people involved in the process.

This enables:-

Employers to manage their costs and recruit better people

Candidates have a better job hunting experience, sometimes earn a sign on fee.

Referrers to make networking profitable as well as rewarding!

Agencies to earn more money and do less cold calling
